sentences.english: The five-day rule also applies to sliced meats purchased from the deli.
sentences.chinese: 五天原則同樣適傭於從熟食店買回的切片肉。

sentences.english: Deli offers freshly-baked breads, cakes, and pies.
sentences.chinese: 熟食店提供新鮮的烤麪包，蛋糕，餡餅。

sentences.english: I think you oughtta have somebody go over to the delicatessen, you know, bring some more back.
sentences.chinese: 我想你會叫別人去熟食店，你知道的，多帶一些回來。

sentences.english: It's best not to use salad bars in restaurants, supermarkets or delicatessens.
sentences.chinese: 最好不要使用沙拉酒吧在餐館，超市或熟食店。

sentences.english: There is a great Italian deli across the street.
sentences.chinese: 穿過街道，有一家年夜的意大利熟食店。

sentences.english: Delicatessen featuring photos and descriptions of the food and secure ordering.
sentences.chinese: 熟食店爲主題的照片和說明的食物和安全的命令。

sentences.english: Enjoy stir-fry favorites, burgers and hot dogs, meatballs, or a gourmet deli sandwich.
sentences.chinese: 喜歡炒的最愛，漢堡和熱狗，肉丸，或熟食店三明治。

sentences.english: Good. How about going to the deli across the street and buying me some food?
sentences.chinese: 那好。可否請你到對面的熟食店，幫我買些東西喫？

sentences.english: Here and there , in big cities , small stores and delicatessens specialize in cheese .
sentences.chinese: 在大城市到處都有一些小店和熟食店專營奶酪。

sentences.english: I think you oughtta have somebody go over to the delicatessen, you know, bring some more back.
sentences.chinese: 我想你會叫他人去熟食店，你曉得的，多帶一些回來。

sentences.english: Tarts were available throughout the day in the deli.
sentences.chinese: 在熟食店，蛋撻全天有售。

sentences.english: Buy cheese and meat from your local delicatessen and have it wrapped in paper.
sentences.chinese: 從當地的熟食店購買奶酪和肉食，並用紙包裹。

definition: supermarket/abbr. for 超級市場|超级市场/CL:家[jia1]
